items.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Aug 28, 2020
items.content_text:
### Utility / Docker Container Actions

*   [Pull the New Go Module Version Into the Proxy Cache (⭐26)](https://github.com/andrewslotin/go-proxy-pull-action) - Ensures the latest version of your Go module is in the proxy cache. Also updates the pkg.go.dev documentation upon release.
*   [Delete Run Artifacts](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/delete-run-artifacts) - Deletes all artifacts at the end of a workflow run.
*   [GitHub Environment Variables Action (⭐188)](https://github.com/FranzDiebold/github-env-vars-action) - Expose environment variables such as the branch/tag name, repository slug, and ref slug.

### Pull Requests / Code Coverage

*   [Set PR Reviewers Based on Assignees (⭐123)](https://github.com/pullreminders/assignee-to-reviewer-action)
*   [Open or Update PR on Branch Push (with Branch Selection) (⭐173)](https://github.com/vsoch/pull-request-action)
*   [Automatically Rebase a PR (⭐697)](https://github.com/cirrus-actions/rebase)
*   [Label PR once it has a Specified Number of Approvals (⭐192)](https://github.com/pullreminders/label-when-approved-action)
*   [Add Labels to a PR based on Matched File Patterns (⭐63)](https://github.com/banyan/auto-label)
*   [Auto-Approve PRs (⭐448)](https://github.com/hmarr/auto-approve-action)
*   [Automatically add Reviewers to PR based on the Configuration File (⭐351)](https://github.com/kentaro-m/auto-assign-action)
*   [Add Labels to a PR based on Branch Name Patterns (⭐258)](https://github.com/TimonVS/pr-labeler-action)
*   [Add Labels to a PR based on Total Size of the Diff (⭐92)](https://github.com/pascalgn/size-label-action)
*   [Automatically merge PRs That Are Ready (⭐892)](https://github.com/pascalgn/automerge-action)
*   [Verify That PRs Contain a Ticket Reference (⭐76)](https://github.com/vijaykramesh/pr-lint-action)
*   [Create a PR for Changes to your Repository in the Actions Workspace (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/peter-evans/create-pull-request)
*   [Lint a PR (⭐120)](https://github.com/seferov/pr-lint-action)
*   [ChatOps for PRs (⭐75)](https://github.com/machine-learning-apps/actions-chatops)
*   [Prefix Title and Body of a PR Based on Text Extracted from Branch Name (⭐82)](https://github.com/tzkhan/pr-update-action)
*   [Merge Pal - Automatically Update and Merge PRs (⭐32)](https://github.com/maxkomarychev/merge-pal-action)
*   [Pull Request Stuck Notifier](https://github.com/jrylan/github-action-stuck-pr-notifier)
*   [Annotate a GitHub Pull Request Based on a Checkstyle XML-Report (⭐195)](https://github.com/staabm/annotate-pull-request-from-checkstyle)

### Notifications and Messages / Code Coverage

*   [Send an SMS from GitHub Actions using Clockworksms (⭐3)](https://github.com/bharathvaj1995/clockwork-sms-action)

### Deployment / Docker

*   [Convert Branch or Tag Name Into Docker-Compatible Image Tag (⭐5)](https://github.com/ankitvgupta/ref-to-tag-action/)
*   [Update a Container Repository Description From README.md](https://github.com/marketplace/actions/update-container-description-action) - Supported Registries: Docker Hub, Quay, Harbor.

### Machine Learning Ops / Terraform

*   [Automatically Dockerize A Data-Science Repo As A Jupyter Server (⭐145)](https://github.com/jupyterhub/repo2docker-action)
*   [Azure Machine Learning With GitHub Actions (⭐130)](https://github.com/machine-learning-apps/ml-template-azure)
items.content_html:
Utility / Docker Container Actions

  • Pull the New Go Module Version Into the Proxy Cache (⭐26) - Ensures the latest version of your Go module is in the proxy cache. Also updates the pkg.go.dev documentation upon release.
  • Delete Run Artifacts - Deletes all artifacts at the end of a workflow run.
  • GitHub Environment Variables Action (⭐188) - Expose environment variables such as the branch/tag name, repository slug, and ref slug.

Pull Requests / Code Coverage

  • Set PR Reviewers Based on Assignees (⭐123)
  • Open or Update PR on Branch Push (with Branch Selection) (⭐173)
  • Automatically Rebase a PR (⭐697)
  • Label PR once it has a Specified Number of Approvals (⭐192)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Matched File Patterns (⭐63)
  • Auto-Approve PRs (⭐448)
  • Automatically add Reviewers to PR based on the Configuration File (⭐351)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Branch Name Patterns (⭐258)
  • Add Labels to a PR based on Total Size of the Diff (⭐92)
  • Automatically merge PRs That Are Ready (⭐892)
  • Verify That PRs Contain a Ticket Reference (⭐76)
  • Create a PR for Changes to your Repository in the Actions Workspace (⭐2.4k)
  • Lint a PR (⭐120)
  • ChatOps for PRs (⭐75)
  • Prefix Title and Body of a PR Based on Text Extracted from Branch Name (⭐82)
  • Merge Pal - Automatically Update and Merge PRs (⭐32)
  • Pull Request Stuck Notifier
  • Annotate a GitHub Pull Request Based on a Checkstyle XML-Report (⭐195)

Notifications and Messages / Code Coverage

  • Send an SMS from GitHub Actions using Clockworksms (⭐3)

Deployment / Docker

  • Convert Branch or Tag Name Into Docker-Compatible Image Tag (⭐5)
  • Update a Container Repository Description From README.md - Supported Registries: Docker Hub, Quay, Harbor.

Machine Learning Ops / Terraform

  • Automatically Dockerize A Data-Science Repo As A Jupyter Server (⭐145)
  • Azure Machine Learning With GitHub Actions (⭐130)

items.content_text:
### Official Resources

*   [GitHub Blog Announcement](https://github.blog/2018-10-17-action-demos/)

### Workflow Examples

*   [actions/starter-workflows (⭐10k)](https://github.com/actions/starter-workflows) - Starter workflow management.
*   [actions/example-services (⭐252)](https://github.com/actions/example-services) - Example workflows using service containers.

### Official Actions / Workflow Tool Actions

*   [actions/checkout (⭐6.7k)](https://github.com/actions/checkout) - Setup your repository on your workflow.
*   [actions/upload-artifact (⭐3.6k)](https://github.com/actions/upload-artifact) - Upload artifacts from your workflow.
*   [actions/download-artifact (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/actions/download-artifact) - Download artifacts from your build.
*   [actions/cache (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/actions/cache) - Cache dependencies and build outputs in GitHub Actions.
*   [actions/github-script (⭐4.6k)](https://github.com/actions/github-script) - Write a script for GitHub API and the workflow contexts.

### Official Actions / Actions for GitHub Automation

*   [actions/create-release (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/actions/create-release) - An Action to create releases via the GitHub Release API.
*   [actions/upload-release-asset (⭐703)](https://github.com/actions/upload-release-asset) - An Action to upload a release asset via the GitHub Release API.
*   [actions/first-interaction (⭐795)](https://github.com/actions/first-interaction) - An action for filtering pull requests and issues from first-time contributors.
*   [actions/stale (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/actions/stale) - Marks issues and pull requests that have not had recent interaction.
*   [actions/labeler (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/actions/labeler) - An action for automatically labelling pull requests.

### Official Actions / Setup Actions

*   [actions/setup-node: Node.js (⭐4.3k)](https://github.com/actions/setup-node)
*   [actions/setup-python: Python (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/actions/setup-python)
*   [actions/setup-go: Go (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/actions/setup-go)
*   [actions/setup-dotnet: .NET core sdk (⭐1k)](https://github.com/actions/setup-dotnet)
*   [actions/setup-haskell: Haskell (GHC and Cabal) (⭐71)](https://github.com/actions/setup-haskell)
*   [actions/setup-java: Java (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/actions/setup-java)
*   [actions/setup-ruby: Ruby (⭐175)](https://github.com/actions/setup-ruby)
*   [actions/setup-elixir: Elixir (⭐154)](https://github.com/actions/setup-elixir)

### Create your Actions / JavaScript and TypeScript Actions

*   [actions/toolkit (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/actions/toolkit) - The GitHub ToolKit for developing GitHub Actions.
*   [actions/hello-world-javascript-action (⭐273)](https://github.com/actions/hello-world-javascript-action) - A template to demonstrate how to build a JavaScript action.
*   [actions/javascript-action (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/actions/javascript-action) - Create a JavaScript Action.
*   [actions/typescript-action (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/actions/typescript-action) - Create a TypeScript Action.

### Create your Actions / Docker Container Actions

*   [actions/hello-world-docker-action (⭐176)](https://github.com/actions/hello-world-docker-action) - A template to demonstrate how to build a Docker action.
*   [actions/container-toolkit-action (⭐138)](https://github.com/actions/container-toolkit-action) - Template repo for creating container actions using actions/toolkit.

### Tutorials / Terraform

*   [Working with GitHub Actions](https://jeffrafter.com/working-with-github-actions)
items.content_html:
Official Resources

  • GitHub Blog Announcement

Workflow Examples

  • actions/starter-workflows (⭐10k) - Starter workflow management.
  • actions/example-services (⭐252) - Example workflows using service containers.

Official Actions / Workflow Tool Actions

  • actions/checkout (⭐6.7k) - Setup your repository on your workflow.
  • actions/upload-artifact (⭐3.6k) - Upload artifacts from your workflow.
  • actions/download-artifact (⭐1.6k) - Download artifacts from your build.
  • actions/cache (⭐4.9k) - Cache dependencies and build outputs in GitHub Actions.
  • actions/github-script (⭐4.6k) - Write a script for GitHub API and the workflow contexts.

Official Actions / Actions for GitHub Automation

  • actions/create-release (⭐1.4k) - An Action to create releases via the GitHub Release API.
  • actions/upload-release-asset (⭐703) - An Action to upload a release asset via the GitHub Release API.
  • actions/first-interaction (⭐795) - An action for filtering pull requests and issues from first-time contributors.
  • actions/stale (⭐1.5k) - Marks issues and pull requests that have not had recent interaction.
  • actions/labeler (⭐2.2k) - An action for automatically labelling pull requests.

  • actions/setup-node: Node.js (⭐4.3k)
  • actions/setup-python: Python (⭐1.9k)
  • actions/setup-go: Go (⭐1.5k)

  • actions/setup-java: Java (⭐1.7k)
  • actions/setup-ruby: Ruby (⭐175)
  • actions/setup-elixir: Elixir (⭐154)

Create your Actions / JavaScript and TypeScript Actions

  • actions/toolkit (⭐5.4k) - The GitHub ToolKit for developing GitHub Actions.
  • actions/hello-world-javascript-action (⭐273) - A template to demonstrate how to build a JavaScript action.
  • actions/javascript-action (⭐1.1k) - Create a JavaScript Action.
  • actions/typescript-action (⭐2.3k) - Create a TypeScript Action.

Create your Actions / Docker Container Actions

  • actions/hello-world-docker-action (⭐176) - A template to demonstrate how to build a Docker action.

items.title: Awesome Actions Updates on Feb 27, 2019
items.content_text:
### Official Resources

*   [Official Site](https://github.com/features/actions)

### GitHub Tools and Management / Docker Container Actions

*   [Declaratively setup GitHub Labels (⭐191)](https://github.com/lannonbr/issue-label-manager-action)

### Collection of Actions / Docker Container Actions

*   [GitHub Actions for Golang (⭐133)](https://github.com/cedrickring/golang-action)
*   [GitHub Actions for R and accompanying #rstats package](http://maxheld.de/ghactions/)
*   [GitHub Actions for WordPress (⭐441)](https://github.com/10up/actions-wordpress/)

### Static Analysis / Semantic Versioning

*   [PHPStan Static code analyzer Action (⭐101)](https://github.com/OskarStark/phpstan-ga)
*   [GraphQL Inspector Action (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/kamilkisiela/graphql-inspector)
*   [PowerShell static analysis with PSScriptAnalyzer (⭐74)](https://github.com/devblackops/github-action-psscriptanalyzer)

### Static Analysis / Testing

*   [Run Tests through Puppeteer, the Headless Chrome Node API (⭐93)](https://github.com/ianwalter/puppeteer)

### GitHub Pages / Code Coverage

*   [Deploy a Zola site to GitHub Pages (⭐263)](https://github.com/shalzz/zola-deploy-action)
*   [Build Hugo static content site and publish it to gh-pages branch (⭐42)](https://github.com/khanhicetea/gh-actions-hugo-deploy-gh-pages)
*   [Build a Jekyll site—with Custom Jekyll Plugins & Build Scripts—and deploy it back to the Gh-Pages Branch (⭐120)](https://github.com/BryanSchuetz/jekyll-deploy-gh-pages)
*   [Google Dataset Search Metadata](https://www.github.com/openschemas/extractors/) - And other schema.org extractors to make datasets discoverable from GitHub pages.

### Notifications and Messages / Code Coverage

*   [Send a Discord notification (⭐439)](https://github.com/Ilshidur/action-discord)
*   [Post a Slack message as a bot (⭐274)](https://github.com/pullreminders/slack-action)
*   [Send an SMS from GitHub Actions using Nexmo (⭐14)](https://github.com/nexmo-community/nexmo-sms-action)
*   [Send a Telegram Message (⭐941)](https://github.com/appleboy/telegram-action)

### Deployment / Code Coverage

*   [Deploy to Netlify (⭐376)](https://github.com/netlify/actions)
*   [Deploy a Probot App using Actions](https://probot.github.io/docs/deployment/#github-actions)
*   [Deploy a playlist to Spotify (⭐116)](https://github.com/swinton/SpotHub)
*   [Deploy VS Code extensions with vsce (⭐91)](https://github.com/lannonbr/vsce-action)
*   [Deploy your DNS configuration using DNS Control (⭐87)](https://github.com/koenrh/dnscontrol-action)

### External Services / Terraform

*   [Use a Jenkinsfile (⭐208)](https://github.com/jonico/jenkinsfile-runner-github-actions)
*   [GitHub Action for Firebase (⭐940)](https://github.com/w9jds/firebase-action)
*   [GitHub Action for Contentful Migration CLI (⭐15)](https://github.com/Shy/contentful-action)

### Frontend Tools / Terraform

*   [Execute Gradle task (⭐29)](https://github.com/MrRamych/gradle-actions)
*   [JS Build Actions (⭐54)](https://github.com/elstudio/actions-js-build) - Run Grunt or Gulp build tasks and commit file changes.
*   [GitHub Action for Gatsby CLI (⭐47)](https://github.com/jzweifel/gatsby-cli-github-action)
